Translations.Text: Tadera purbe ami phera'unera sampradayake pariksa karechi ebam tadera kache agamana karechena ekajana sam'manita rasula
e'i marme ye, allahara bandaderake amara kache arpana kara. Ami tomadera jan'ya prerita bisbasta rasula.
Ara tomara allahara birud'dhe aud'dhatya prakasa karo na. Ami tomadera kache prakasya pramana upasthita karachi.
Tomara yate amake prastarabarsane hatya na kara, tajjan'ye ami amara palanakarta o tomadera palanakartara saranapanna hayechi.
Tomara yadi amara prati bisbasa sthapana na kara, tabe amara kacha theke dure thaka.
Atahpara se tara palanakartara kache doya karala ye, era aparadhi sampradaya.
Tahale tumi amara bandaderake niye ratribelaya bera haye para. Niscaya tomadera pascad'dhabana kara habe.
Ebam samudrake acala thakate da'o. Niscaya ora nimajjata bahini.
Tara chere giyechila kata udyana o prasrabana
kata sasyaksetra o suramya sthana.
Kata sukhera upakarana, yate tara khosagalpa karata.
Emani'i hayechila ebam ami ogulora malika karechilama bhinna sampradayake.
Tadera jan'ye krandana kareni akasa o prthibi ebam tara abakasa'o payani.
Ami bani-isara'ilake apamanajanaka sasti theke ud'dhara karachi.
Phera'una se chila simalanghanakaridera madhye sirsasthaniya.
Ami jenesune taderake bisbabasidera upara sresthatba diyechilama.
Ebam ami taderake emana nidarsanabali diyechilama yate chila spasta sahayya.
Kapherara bale'i thake
prathama mrtyura madhyame'i amadera sabakichura abasana habe ebam amara punarut'thita haba na.
Tomara yadi satyabadi ha'o, tabe amadera purbapurusaderake niye esa.
Ora srestha, na tubbara sampradaya o tadera purbabartira? Ami oderake dhbansa kare diyechi. Ora chila aparadhi.
Ami nabhomandala, bhumandala o etadubhayera madhyabarti sabakichu kriracchale srsti karini.
Ami egulo yathayatha uddesye srsti karechi; kintu tadera adhikansa'i bojhe na.
Niscaya phayasalara dina tadera sabara'i nirdharita samaya.
Yedina kona bandhu'i kona bandhura upakare asabe na ebam tara sahayyaprapta'o habe na.
Tabe allaha yara prati daya karena, tara katha bhinna. Niscaya tini parakramasali dayamaya.
Niscaya yakkuma brksa
papira khadya habe
galita tamrera mata pete phutate thakabe.
Yemana phute pani.
Eke dhara ebam tene niye ya'o jahannamera madhyasthale
atahpara tara mathara upara phutanta panira ayaba dhele da'o
sbada grahana kara, tumi to sam'manita, sambhranta.
E samparke tomara sandehe patita chile.
Niscaya khodabhirura nirapada sthane thakabe
udyanaraji o nirjharinisamuhe.
Tara paridhana karabe cikana o puru resamibastra, mukhomukhi haye basabe.
Erupa'i habe ebam ami taderake anatalocana stri deba.
Tara sekhane santa mane bibhinna phala-mula anate balabe.
Tara sekhane mrtyu asbadana karabe na, prathama mrtyu byatita ebam apanara palanakarta taderake jahannamera ayaba theke raksa karabena.
Apanara palanakartara krpaya eta'i maha saphalya.
Ami apanara bhasaya kora'anake sahaja kare diyechi, yate tara smarana rakhe.
Ata'eba, apani apeksa karuna, tara'o apeksa karache.
Ha-mima.
Parakranta, prajnamaya allahara paksa theke abatirna e kitaba.
Niscaya nabhomandala o bhu-mandale muminadera jan'ye nidarsanabali rayeche.
Ara tomadera srstite ebam caradike chariye rakha jiba jantura srjanera madhye'o nidarsanabali rayeche bisbasidera jan'ya.

Dibaratrira paribartane, allaha akasa theke ye riyika (brsti) barsana karena atahpara prthibike tara mrtyura para punarujjibita karena, tate ebam bayura paribartane bud'dhimanadera jan'ye nidarsanabali rayeche.
Egulo allahara ayata, ya ami apanara kache abrtti kari yathayatharupe. Ata'eba, allaha o tamra ayatera para tara kona kathaya bisbasa sthapana karabe.
Pratyeka mithyabadi papacarira durbhoga.
Se allahara ayatasamuha sune, atahpara ahankari haye jeda dhare, yena se ayata suneni. Ata'eba, take yantranadayaka sastira susambada dina.
Yakhana se amara kona ayata abagata haya, takhana take thattarupe grahana kare. Edera jan'ya'i rayeche lanchanadayaka sasti.
Tadera samane rayeche jahannama. Tara ya uparjana kareche, ta tadera kona kaje asabe na, tara allahara paribarte yaderake bandhurupe grahana kareche tara'o naya. Tadera jan'ye rayeche mahasasti.
Eta satpatha pradarsana, ara yara tadera palanakartara ayatasamuha asbikara kare, tadera jan'ye rayeche kathora yantranadayaka sasti.
